tool_description: “BoredomBuster is a dynamic web API that generates random activities for users. It’s designed to inspire and engage, providing users with unique suggestions when they’re unsure of what to do next. Whether you’re looking for a creative hobby, an educational pursuit, or just a fun way to pass the time, BoredomBuster has got you covered.”
name: BoredomBuster
title: BoredomBuster

api_list.name: activity
